p: The antifungal effect of 389 was assessed by agar disc diffusion assay towards Candida albicans (AUMC No. 418), Geotrichium candidum (AUMC No. 226), and Trichophyton rubrum (AUMC No. 1804) as fungi. It exhibited selective antifungal activity towards C. albicans (MIC 1.9 µg/mL and IZD 14.5 mm), comparing to the antifungal standard clotrimazole (MIC 2.8 µg/mL and IZD 17.9 mm), whilst, it had moderate activity against G. candidum (MIC 6.9 µg/mL and IZD 28.9 mm) [ 125].
